publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-762.1 Mike Pringle: Congratulations to the Drake Music Project Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S3M-762) in the name of George Foulkes, leave out from "in light of" to end and insert "given the dire financial position inherited by the new administration from the previous Labour administration’s mishandling of the council finances."
S3M-762.1 Congratulations to the Drake Music Project Scotland (lodged on 5 November 2007) Jim Tolson*, Jim Hume*, Bashir Ahmad*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Liam McArthur*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-762.1 Congratulations to the Drake Music Project Scotland (lodged on 5 November 2007) Keith Brown*

S3M-762.1 Mike Pringle: Congratulations to the Drake Music Project Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S3M-762) in the name of George Foulkes, leave out from "in light of" to end and insert "given the dire financial position inherited by the new administration from the previous Labour administration’s mishandling of the council finances." Supported by: Jim Tolson, Jim Hume, Bashir Ahmad, Hugh O’Donnell, Liam McArthur, Stuart McMillan, Keith Brown
